content.detailedDescription: In the fall about 3yrs. ago i was sitting in my living room watching tv by myself at about 11pm, when a bright light outside my living room window caught my eye. it looked like a bright headlight. i went outside on the deck to see what it was. there was now sound. it was a clear night, very still. the object was about 150 yards from my deck and about 40ft. off the ground. it was moving slowly down the fairway. seemed to bob up & down & move from one side to the other. i watched it go all the way down the fairway to the valley when i lost sight of it. about 2-3 minutes. i came back in, i was freezing.
content.summary: Saw a bright light moving about 40ft off the ground. laurie,mo.

content.detailedDescription:
My son was on a walk lastnight. there was a fullmoon clear skys, lots of stars. we live out in the country away from city lights. saw 2 very bright lights above the trees moving very slow. he tried to get a picture with his cell phone, but it didn't show up. it made no sound. he could see the lights were not attached to anything. they were not connected to each other. not airplane landing lights. no blinking lights.
 over the summer we have seen alot of round orange lights moving slowly from the west to the north. no binking lights.
content.summary: Saw 2 very bright lights above trees, no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 8:30 pst, i was standing facing northwest on my back porch observing the skyline and noted three objects in the sky. two objects easily identifiable as (1) commercial airliner inbound for san jose international airport, and (2) a smaller civilian aircraft heading southest. 

i first thought the third object was another commercial aircraft flying at cruising altitude, but noted no marker lights. heading was from nw to south. object was low against the skyline, but was definitely at greater height than both identifiable craft. 

was able to extrapolate heading based on flight paths of both identifiable craft (commercial flight heading north inbound to sji, civilian/small craft heading se, possibly inbound to airfield in morgan hill (best guess).

unitentifiable object crossed paths (at it's higher altitude) with both craft, flying opposite direction of commercial craft, and continuing south behind civilian/small craft.

after noting no discernable flight markers required of craft in high density flight zone (i am also close to moffett field), i began tracking object, having to move several feet to my right, as object was going to be obscured by treeline.

i noted the object had a very stable flight pattern, like a commercial liner in flight, but the bright light with no flashing was peculiar. as i tracked object southward, the bright light dimmed and turned a dull, brick-red. i was able to track object through trees with some difficulty, moving once to get a better view. object continued to grow more dim, or had suddenly moved much further away (i could not be certain).

went through my side gate to the front yard to continue tracking object, as tree obstructed view again, but could no longer follow it's flight path.

i live in a high air-traffic area, and being prone to looking up at the night sky when i am outside, i can be fairly certain this was not a commercial craft, and was too high to be a civilian/small craft. light pollution rules out a satellite (can't see them at night here).
content.summary: Point of light tracked across night sky; light faded to red, then disappeared from view

content.detailedDescription: Urgent, urgent, urgent!!!! possible ufo crash!!!! as stated above.
content.summary: White-blue fireball with yellow-wite sparks seemigly crashing into hills beyond morongo valley preserve/dhs area.

content.detailedDescription:
Last week 9-10-2008 i went to sleep about 8:00pm
and i awaken with other small gray aliens about 5
to 6 of them and it was dark in the room. and i am
not shure where we all where but i got up and turn
a light on and the room was white and the light
seemed to shock the little grays for some reason
and then somebody turned out the light i think
and that is all i remember for that event.

the next night 9-11-2008 i went to sleep about 8:00pm
and i awakened i think it was maybe 11:00pm to 3:00am
and i saw a dark entity next to my bed it had its
head a few inches from my head and it was moving its
head back and forth a bit and the et was produceing
a energy that was agravating saying something like
"era" and "gra" and something else i cant remember
by its mentail projection instead of words because
they can speak english, i have heard them many times.
and i fell back to sleep. i was haveing a dream at
the time with a girl that was about 38 because
i am 46 that i was just talking to about something
and the event with the et disruped me or the dream.

it took me a few day to figure out what happen and
how to write this up where it made sence.
content.summary: Two et encounters

content.detailedDescription:
Nothing to say here, was snapping pictures of the ship and saw object on upper left, thought it was weird, bot prob a plane so i thought nothing of it and kept taking pictures.

i snapped picture twice since the first time was blurry of the ship, so snapped a second one immediately within a sec as i know my camera is the way to get a clear picture. noticed that in that 1 second window the 4 lights moved in a split second.. although i saw them, i thought nothing of them at the time, but now i dont know.

wish to submit pictures for report.
content.summary: Was trying to get a good night picture of my cruise ship and caught my eye

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and my 14 yr old son were visiting a friend of mine on the evening of august 19 2008. i remember it being very clear out as we were in his garage the whole time. we were also looking at a plane coming at us from the east that evening as we were discusing if it was a star or a plane in the distance. i remember watching it for quite awile before we realized it was a plane. anyway we left at around 9pm and were headed for home, we took a short detour to the local supermarket to get some ice cream. as we headed west toward the store, we saw some strange lights to the north, my first thought that it was some kind of a carnival going on, we saw the lights about at treetop level as we did loose sight as our vision was interrupted by the trees. i was trying to think of the area and what and were it could possibly be, but the area of the lights was rural. then we reached our destination about 10 -15 seconds later. we got out saw nothing and went to the store. while i was in the store my wife called, and said you wont believe what she and my 18 yr old daughter just saw, i said yes i would cause i just saw it myself. we went home talked about it and that was it, i guess were all loosing our minds together. i forgot about it pretty much till the other day talking to my nieghbor, they brought up, so you saw the ufo too? im like ya. turns out they saw something to but after confirming the dates this evening, they saw the ufo on  the 2nd of september also a tuesday night. im sorry but no pics were taken as i guess we were to mesmorized to react fast enough. well i guess im officially nuts since i just wrote this letter to you. 

sincerally john mullett
content.summary: Driving home from a friends house, with my 14 yr old son on a very clear night, looked to the north and saw something that looked very strange.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were watching sarah palin on tv about 930 at night, it was the night of the republican national convention. my husband popped up from the couch and said, what's that! i turned the lights off in the house to see the set of three lights revolving across the treetops. the lights seemed to move horizontally about 300 yards from our house. the lights were orange and we just stood there in amazement saying what is that? i grabbed the binoculars to see it better when the sky burst in to a bright orange color behind a treetop like a firework but with no sound. it looked as if it were a base or the bottom of something, not shaped like an airplane but something elongated. as it moved horizontally across the sky, we lost sight of it behind the tree tops and the woods to the right of our house.  we didn't even think to go out side, we were too stunned to and i was frightened. i'd never seen anything like that ever! nothing rational seems to explain it as i have mulled it over in my head for about two weeks.
content.summary: Diagonal set of three lights like it was revolving across the sky just above the treetops then lit up like a fire work

content.detailedDescription:
One of our reader contacted and requested to look at 46miles from city of behia blanca,state-buenos aires,argentina on google earth .Firstly the co author of ufoblogger think it could be some kind of colour error or overlap of image at the time of processing but when we looked at that area it stunned him.

because when we start looking for more information on this site we find other anomaly's and facilities too which made us to rethink about being only color error.

then we think might be argentina government or its counterpart(u.S.A) could have some kind of secret base on that site.So we started to explore the possibility of american connection in argentina

for our surprise we find this news article ��� back in 1988 president bill clinton named argentina the only "major non-nato ally" in latin america. (24) conae had already participated with nasa in the development of the satellite de aplicaciones cienfifico (sac) microsatellites as a space-research project. (25) as argentina continues to seek closer military ties with the united states, mainly through peacekeeping operations, its space program now appears more cooperative with that of the united states. its plans to develop the satellites for observation and communications (saocom)-1a radar satellite include italy--another nato ally of the united states. (26) also, the united states views the launch of latinsat-a and -b by aprize satellite in 2002 as a commercial endeavor with no national-security implications. (27) one reason the argentine space program is now perceived as more pro-united states is that most funding for programs with us competitors has largely stopped as a result of the government's fiscal crisis and lingering economic problems���

argentina came more closer to united states when it participate in the 1991 gulf war under mandate of the united nations. at that time it was the only latin american country involved in every phase of the haiti operation full article http://www.Ufoblogger.Blogspot.Com
content.shape: Flash,  Oval,  Saturn-like,  Square,  Rectagular,  Teardrop
content.summary: Ufo and alien anomaly, buenos aires, argentina, 2008.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 22:30 pm saturday 13th sept 2008 a friend and myself walked out into my yard planning to try and snap some night shots with his new olympus e410 slr camera, being a new hobby of his it was to be a trial and error type of operation and we really weren't expecting any type of miracle results, we certainly didn't expect to to end up snapping what we did.
at my friends request i had gone to find a camera tripod i knew i had somewhere and on returning found my fearless pal retreating back into the kitchen backwards with a very worried look on his face. on asking what the **** was up with him he just pointed and asked "so what would that be then?"
i have to admit his worried look was justified for a second while "comet" went through my head and "plane crash"  because the whole cloud looked as if it were on fire, my friend later described it as "a fire in the sky". 
it is a shame we spent the next twenty seconds doing laurel and hardy impressions, running around tripping over ourselves, we couldn't believe what we were seeing. by the time we had camera and tripod set up the object in question had cleared the clouds and was giving off a beautifully sharp burnt orange/red (like fire i suppose but much ...Clearer?) this is where my friend managed to get a few shots off as it started to make it's way away from us to the east over the rooftops, this is when i moved to get a better look and noticed the second object, much brighter, lower and much nearer coming straight towards us. we hadn't noticed this one due to the chimney blocking our line of site. after a brief arguement about shaking people when they're trying to take a photo we managed to reposition the camera and get both objects in the view finder.
by this time the first object was disappearing over to the east and within a matter of 10-15 seconds the second one had stopped approximately 1 mile away, hovered in place for a matter of seconds and joined it leaving us both pretty much dumbfounded.
the whole event must have taken no more than 4-5 mins. maybe even less. it certainly wasn't a helicopter or aeroplane, i can't say what it was but it was eerily strange and a little un-nerving, especially the cloud effect.
the objects moved slowly, independently of each other and were seen in the east in the approach to manchester airport which is approximately 20 miles away. all i know about the pics themselves is the fact that he was trying different (apeture/f-stop..?) settings to get more detail, some shots worked many didn't but we managed to get a few.
i'm not sure what i expect any-one to do with this, i'm sure it's just one more of an increasing number of reports but the photo's are yours to do whatever it is you do with them and i hope they help.
thank-you

john

p.S.
photo p9131979.Bmp not agreat photo but it shows both in the same shot.
content.summary: Two spherical objects glowing brilliant burnt orange, very visible, moving independently and at different heights,observed for 7 mins max. and photographed

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my patio. just looked up to see the objects. took a couple minutes to figure out what i was looking at - didn't know what they were at first and still don't. objects would rotate up to reveal 5 bright white lights. then they would turn to become only a single white light. they would then emit a red light and dart off into any given direction. they would go down close to the ocean and all the way back up. distances and speeds unknown. both objects came in close to the shore after entering the water. this is when we lost them both. one first and the next one a few minutes later.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 objects moving at high speeds at night - white and red

content.detailedDescription: While riding around the plant that i work at in a golf cart i happened to notice a vey large and bright star looking oject  coming from the west.When the oject got overhead of me it turned to the southeast.I first thought it might be a sattelite but i know sattelites keep the same flight path and dont make turns.I watched the object until it dissapeared on the southeastern horizon.What amazed me was the brightness and the star like appearance.
content.summary: Very bright star object

content.detailedDescription: I was on a bus on long pond road, sitting in the front of a bus. at this point in the road there are almost all trees on both sides and hardly many houses. the bus took a left turn and i went to open a window. after i sat down i looked up into the front window and i saw a sleek black shape catch the corner of my eye. i thought it might be an f14 or f15 jet from ottis air force base, which would have been cool, but it stopped and changed it's ascending angle much higher, and actually went through the cloud, and i realized it didn't look like  a jet as well, even from as far away as i was. it was shaped like a diamond that has been squished down pretty sqwat. i think but am not etirely sure it made a small hole in the cloud. i did not hear any sound, and i believe that i would have with a jet, even a few miles away, but i'm no jet expert. all this happened in seconds. during it i was excited because i thought it was a jet until it changed direction and i became nervous about it, this was the first time i have ever seen an unidentified flying object. *looking back, maybe a jet could have turned it's angle in a split-second but the shape is what gets to me.
content.summary: A black object that went into a cloud.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend from ohio has been in contact now for over 3 months what ever he is seeing off of east lake ohio, we are seeing here in pennsylvania like every time we talk on the phone he tells me what the color of the object is and that it is heading my way well low and behold i see the very thing that he is seeing they come up along the top of our mountain they are like 3 different colors reddish white blueish white and greenish white plus we also see the real bright star like object not once but so many times that it's getting to also look like a ufo run way and every time we see them they all sneak out of no where every report that i have read on here so far seems to be what we are seeing up here in pa, i will keep everyone informed on what we are seeing her in northumberland county, pennsylvania also my friends reports as well off of eastlake, ohio,
content.summary: Friend from ohio reported seeing 3 ufo's coming off of lake

content.detailedDescription:
These are the real divine light beings you are photographing.
please keep posting what you see so as many people as possible can see them as your photos are absolutly fantastic.
please share them with all of us.

thanks so much for filming them god bless to all of you!
content.summary: Please keep posting images from kentucky

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i hosted a dinner for another couple on saturday night. while the ladies were in the house making the dinner myself and my friend (who i will keep anonymous,hes about 50yrs old) were in the backyard simply talking about current events. ive confidently expressed my belief in ufo's in the past so he knows were my interest lie. as we were talking i looked over at him but noticed just about his head above the horizon about 18 degrees was a solid black object which made absolutely no sound. the object was not in the shape of a helicopter and most definately not a plane. ive never seen a black blimp before and this object was way to far to be a black balloon or even a bunch of black balloons.

i did not want to make a huge deal over it with the guest, but mentioned him to take a look at the object with me and i gave him a moment to really take it in. when the time was right i tested him by saying, "well it looks like a trash bag floating off" but of course i didnt mean that at all. he responded by saying "no way, its way to far and big to be a bag"

the object was about the size of a pea (at arms length) in the dusk sky. more day than night. this was my first sighting.
content.summary: I was standing in my backyard and noticed to my north east a solid black object totally silent.

content.detailedDescription: The director of mufon.Com [earl]was invited to my residence,where i blew his socks off..The following photos were taken along with 3 other cameras running,all of which show the same story...This is real.
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Circle,  Diamond,  Star-like,  Other
content.summary: This was taken in the presence of the director of mufon......Earl

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were star gazing in our hot tub saturday night. i noticed a star moving in the sky. i said what is that? we watched it travel from west to east then it turned north at a 45 degree angle. it was the size of a star, a little bit brighter. no faa lights on it. no blinking lights. as we watched it i got chills because i knew what we were looking at. a ufo!! it disappeared as it headed north. 15 minutes later or so we were looking for it in the same area. it came back again. traveling along the same path as before but came from the north heading south. same size like a star. it stopped in the sky and to me it was "pretending" to be a star. then it started moving again and passed below the moon and disappeared while traveling south. we were amazed and shocked. then last night we were again in the hot tub, but with our son this time. we were talking about what we saw the night before. not even 10 minutes later, same area of the sky, i spot a traveling star again. we all watched it move from south to north again. then disappeared, again. it was cool that my 12 yr son got to see it. it was a little freaky though. my husband said mabey it was the ufo freeway or something. we'll be looking again tonight, and everynight!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like ufo moving in the sky saturday & sunday night

content.detailedDescription: On 09/14/08 at 6:58pm i went out to my front porch which faces north. i sat down on my swing and called my friend who lives 3 mile north of me. we were talking and i noticed an object in the sky moving form the east to the west in a straight line kind of slow. i knew it wasn't a plane, jet or hellicoptor. it was also silent. i told my friend about it and they asked me where i was looking and that they were also outside. then they told me they could also see it and that it was silent. they also said they could not figure out what it was. i then said maybe it is a ufo. we were both watch it and i said i was going to go get my camera and get some pictures then blow them up. immediately after that the thing disappeared. i told my friend it vanished and they said the same, it was just there and now gone. they then said it must be a ufo. within seconds i started to hear a sound of a jet. i said to my friend i am starting to hear a jet, maybe it was some kind of jet. right after i said that a jet coming from the south flew over my house towards where the ufo was. it was one of those jets with the radar on top of it. i think they call them awax or awac. shortly after it was out of sight and you could not hear it anymore.
content.summary: Ufo flying by then disappeared, then awac jet flying by

content.detailedDescription: I was siting in the back yard of my work smokeing a ciggaret with my coworker when i looked up in to the northwestern part of the sky in the back yard of my work and saw a blue whit light going across the sky it was bright enough that it drew my attn to it cause i was not orginally looking at the sky it contniued on a straight path moveing slow for about 30 secondsthen the light that it was imiteing began to shrink in on its self till it dissapred i called my coworkers attn to the spot where the light winked out at as me and my coworker were standing there talking about what i had seen we were both looking at the spot in the sky where the light had winked out at when there was a sudden bright flash in the spot it winked out in
content.summary: Big blue ball of light

content.detailedDescription: Round ufo spoted in buena park california, ufo seems to be between white and orange color, ufo not moving, then it moves right on top of us, ans spinning around, then ufo moves slowly and goes away, this is the same ufo that i have seen many times before, i took my daughter 1 time to see it with me and the ufo showed up again, now my daughter believes me, this ufo is in a very short video,you can only see the video on a vcr tape player.
content.summary: It is on a short video now

content.detailedDescription: Approximately july 7, 2008.  i was getting ready to sell 15 ponies so i went to all our corrals with a disposible camera. i was in a hurry and just went snapping pictures.  i had to pick up my wife in helena mt.  so it was about 3 or 4 in the afternoon, i quickly used up the roll and went to wal-mart in helena mt.  ask them to just put it on a disc it was done before we left town.  we got home and were going to email the photos to the proscepctive buyers.  when i noticed the ufo in one of the shots at first i though something on the lens but it was fresh out of the tin foil pack and the ufo appeared in none of the other shots.  this not the only sitghting we have experienced out on our ranch but the only one with proof.  the object is in the upper let hand quadrant.
content.summary: Brass sphere

content.detailedDescription:
This is shane gray. we spoke on the phone earlier this evening concerning a sighting over the panhandle near panama city, florida. i do have video tape of the sighting on september 9, 2008. the following is an account of what my family and i saw on that date.
it was approximately 8:00 p.M. on tuesday, september 9, 2008. i was walking from my barn to my house when the object caught my eye. it was a big ball of light and there was a small plane flying directly behind it as if it was chasing or following the object. the ball of light was incredibly bright and coming directly toward me. it started to make a big circle south toward panama city. when it was directly over head, i was able to see the shape of the object, which looked to me kind of like a cigar shape and it looked like there was light coming out of the sides kind of like there was windows on the side. i did not see any wings or any strobe lights at all. it continued south until i lost sight of it. ten to fifteen minutes later, i saw the same object coming back toward my house following the same flight path with the small plane still in trail. then when it started to circle back to the south, the plane continued on a straight path to the north and two fighter jets showed up and followed the object until i lost sight of it again. then ten to fifteen minutes went by and the object showed back up following the same path, but there were a total of six fighter jets following it at this time. one was extremely close to the left side of the object, one to the far right and four behind it flying in formation and it was obvious then that they were following this object. this continued for four more circles in the same flight path. the last time i saw the object it was approximately 9:30 to 10:00 p.M. during the time of this sighting, there were no other planes in this air space. usually there are planes coming over going to and from the airport in panama city. my daughter brought her video camera out and began filming the object on the second pass. 
on thursday, september 11, we were outside in the yard at approximately 9:00 p.M., when we noticed four fighter jets overhead flying erratically. after about thirty or forty-five minutes, these fighter jets began dropping what looked like flares. in the twenty years i have lived on this property, i have never seen these fighter jets drop flares like that, which makes me think that they were trying to confuse us about what we saw two nights before because the flares looked like balls of light coming form the jets. the difference is that the flares disappeared in about ten seconds; the ball of light from september 9 circled around and did not disappear and was constant. we did not video tape the jets on september 11. am in the process of making a digital copy of the video footage we shot on september 9. i will get it to you as soon as possible.
content.summary: i was able to see the shape of the object, a cigar shape

content.detailedDescription: 2/3 lights at incredible speeds and impossible angles over redondo beach/palos verdes.White lights like roman candles accelerating then diving/instantaneous directional changes in both elevation and horizontal planes.I have photos but they are light blurs with steady objects in foreground.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2/3 lights moving at incredible speeds and angles

content.detailedDescription:
We were walking out of a restaurant facing south when i looked into the sky. i saw two lights that initially looked like very fast flying birds that were lit from below. the shapes were weaving in and out, toward and away from each other. at arms length, they would fit between finger and thumb spaced approximately 1/16th of an inch apart. 

in the matter of about 20 seconds the appearance changed from bird-like to airplane-like then they seemed to quickly get much further away and higher and look more like satellites moving in a non-linear pattern as they faded, one a second or two before the other. they were headed east to west toward the sunset.  it seemed strange that the brightness would fade flying towards the sun.  there were no other lights on the objects such as strobes or wing markers.  the objects seemed to be self illuminated.

after they disappeared, what looked like a very slow moving satellite appeared in the same area, moving south to north. it was fairly bright, then faded within about 10 seconds. it was moving in a linear pattern and seemed to slow as it faded.

it was strange to see the "birds" moving and lit up. i mentioned it to my wife and she stated that she did not see birds, but lights. we watched together, guessing what they could be.

the lights seemed very close at first (within 200-300 feet), then quickly gain altitude and move very far away.
content.summary: Initial appearance looked like birds, lit from below, flying toward, then away from each other. appearance quickly changed to satellite-like and circular.

content.detailedDescription: As i was smoking a cigarette on the balcony of my apartment, i noticed a fast moving black disc with a redish white light skip over the monterey bay very quickly. the light was on top of the object and appeared to be revolving around the top of the object. as it came over land on the south side of the bay, near the presidio of monterey, it slowed down and hovered for a few minutes, just a few hundred feet off the ground. it then proceeded to gain altitude and after gaining several hundred more feet, it began to slowly fly back over the bay until it reached about the middle of the bay. it continued to gain altitude, as i eventually could barely see the object and was only able to follow it based on the light atop the disc. it continued climbing into the sky over the bay until it eventually disappeared into the sky over the bay. it lasted about 23 minutes and was also witnessed by my wife. although she only came out to see it climb over the bay and disappear into the sky. it manuevered unlike anything that i am aware of and certainly looked very strange. at first i thought it may be a helicopter, however there was never a noise made by the object and it climbed far to high into the atmosphere to be a helicopter.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A black disc quickly moved over the monterey bay and hovered for some time.

content.detailedDescription:
It was the approx date, sept 68. mother and family saw this over the ocean. cylindrical object over the ocean was seen and it appearsed to go up and up had a light on top, glowed out.
that's all the info i can give without consulting my mother first.
content.summary: Kept going up through to the stratospere,

content.detailedDescription:
Attending a small outdoor party in bernardsville. i was facing south west when i noticed 4 to 5 moving ojects in the sky. the unusual formation, brightness and motion drew my attnetion. at first i thought they could be helicaptors. they flew to near each other to be planes. they appeared to be in loose formation. one object was brighter than others. all moving vertical, upwards....Within 1 to 2 minutes of observation 2 to 3 objectives merged into the one brightest object. now the one object continued to rise. a plane flying perpendicular gave us a good sense for height comparison. this object was much higher. 

2 to 3 minutes later, the object vanished. the lights disappeared like a light switch being shut off. four individuals, in addition to myself, saw the object in the sky.
content.summary: 4 or 5 objects, one brighter than others moving in formation upward

content.detailedDescription: I was just outside looking up at the sky and saw a few planes flying really high. i went in, got my 20x binoculars and looked at them. the first one was a four-engine, solid white/lt. gray plane, which reminded me of a kc-135 to a degree. off of its tail only, there was a stream of white spray coming out. not out of the engines, but off the tip of the tail section. keep in mind, i'd been outside for about an hour and had watched, without binoculars, several passenger and transport planes fly over without any contrails. just as this first, larger plane was moving out of the zenith position, a 2-engine, white plane, like a boeing 737 maybe, was right behind it and it too had the white stream coming off of the tip of its tail. all of a sudden...A brilliant white globe/sphere shot right up out of the west right between the first and second plane. it came up to the right side of the first plane and then angled to the left side of the second plane and i mean it was very close to both of them. then it very slowly moved further away from them in the direction that they had just come. after watching it for about 5 minutes moving slowly around up there it just zipped off just as fast as it had gotten there. no, it didn't appear or disappear into thin air, it just showed up very fast and left very fast. you could not see the ufo without binoculars though because it was so small, maybe 20 feet in comparison to either of the two planes, even in the binoculars it was just an extremely brilliant spherical dot. this is the first ufo i've seen as an adult and with two white (government?) planes laying out a thin stream of who knows what behind them coming through at the same time first? the streams were not leaving contrail marks in the sky, it was only a thin stream coming off of the tail tip section into the air. about an hour later i went back outside and through the binoculars again watched a few commerical planes fly over and none of them had any "streams" coming off of them. there were no contrails either save for a very feathery, whispy one in the area where the two planes described above had been. the contrail was about 10 degrees in width and took up about a 30 degree section of the sky, west to east. i've been around airplanes most of my life, including 4 years in the usaf...This was not normal. the planes came out of the eastnortheast and flew in a straight line to the westsouthwest point. the ufo came out of the west and slowly followed where the "chemical" trail would have been spraying and then after it reached about 60 degrees up from the ene horizon, it flew off in a zip. i tell you this only as a matter of record. that's the quick of it, the time was between 17:00 and 17:15 approximately by the way, skies were mostly sunny with a few fluff clouds flying from west to east. winds were gentle, but you could feel a breeze here and there. i live between etowah, nc and hendersonville, nc with a 360 degree panoramic view of the sky. what do i think about this event? i think that it was some type of government "spraying operation" with some type of spherical drone of sorts coming through checking the content of the air afterwards. could it have been extraterrestrial? i guess, but it didn't seem to feel a need to stop the spraying, so... me? i'm 47, have a b.Sc. degree, a wonderful wife and three children. i've been in r & d for nearly 20 years and am a "normal" person otherwise :-)
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Brilliant spherical ufo flying between two solid white jets overhead

content.detailedDescription:
Summary

the appearing/disappearing daytime star-like object appeared and disappeared seven times during daylight hours over a period of 12 days. three sightings were followed by the appearance of military aircraft. 

08/22/2008 (friday)

while sky gazing at 7:15 pm , i noticed a very bright object in the sky due south of my residence in westlake, la at 45 degrees above the horizon. the object looked similar to a star, except it appeared to be about ten times larger and brighter than any star or planet that i have ever witnessed. it should be noted that sunset this evening was at 7:46 pm and normally stars would not start to appear until about 30 minutes after sunset. (this ���star��� was out about an hour early with the sun still shining brightly). i watched the object for several minutes and it appeared to be stationary. i then went into the house and got my binoculars to have a better look at it and still it appeared to look only like a extremely large and bright star.  i would say that the object appeared to be very high in the sky but not beyond the atmosphere.

at 7:30 pm, i called my wife out of the house to witness the unusual day light ���star���.

i continued to watch the ���star��� until 7:55 pm (a total of 40 minutes) and to the eye it appeared stationary, but apparently it was slowly moving to the west as it was now clearly located directly south west (a 45 degree change in direction), but still 45 degrees above the horizon. at this point, the very bright clearly seen ���star��� got fuzzy and appeared to be starting to pull apart and quickly faded away against the cloudless sky. 

about a minute after the ���star��� faded away, an air force b-52 flew directly over my house at a low altitude flying south westerly and flew exactly past the last position of the large daylight ���star��� that had just faded away. i had called my wife back out of the house to witness that the ���star��� was now gone, as the b-52 aircraft passed overhead. it should be noted that this is first time that i have ever witnessed a b-52 in flight since leaving the military in 1982. i believe that the closest active military air base to my home in 200 miles to the north in shreveport, la and any military aircraft in our area is somewhat rare.

i remained outside to document the time that readily recognized ���normal��� stars start to appear with the first dim star appearing at 8:00 pm and the second at 8:15 pm. the extremely large and bright daylight ���star��� that faded away against a clear sky never reappeared in the sky by the time i ended my watch at 10:00 pm last night.

(8/23/08) saturday

at 7:40 pm, i returned to my backyard in westlake, la and started a through watch to the south and south west direction. (the same direction that i had observed the ���daylight star��� a day earlier.

at 7:50 pm, again a very large and bright starlike object appears suddenly to the south west against the still clear blue sky. (sunset was at 7:46 pm and the sky was still very well lit up at this time).

i watched the object for a minute or so to make sure that it was indeed a stationary object. i then attempted to get the attention of someone inside my home by knocking on the windows while trying to watch the object at the same time. (i did not want to take my eyes off the object just in case it faded away into thin air as it did the day before after observing it for 40 minutes).

after knocking on windows for another minute or so to no avail, i momentarily took my eyes off the object three times and was easily able to re-sight the object each time until the third time and then the object was gone when i looked back up. i remained outside watching for another hour without ever seeing the very large and bright ���daylight star��� again. however, during this time frame all of the ���normal stars��� that i normally see each evening began to slowly and dimly appear starting around 8:15 pm. i did not notice any ���normal stars��� moving or disappearing.

i do not know what this very large bright starlike object is, but i am almost positive that it is not a star or a planet.

8/28/08 (thursday)

19:35	observed reappearance of daytime star-like object against a clear blue sky 45 degrees above the horizon sw of my residence in westlake, louisiana. unlike the first two sightings of this object, this time the object was not extremely brilliant. i then observed the object through binoculars and it appeared to be metallic and chrome colored, shaped like a hamburger bum.

19:37	at this point, i phoned my son who was located 10-15 miles sw of my residence and presumably that much closer to the object and ask if he could sight the object. he easily located the object in the same relative position in the sky to him as it was located to myself. when asking my son if he saw the star, he stated that ���the object was not a star as it was defiantly metallic, but he was unable to identify what it was���.

19:45	shot six still photos of the object on a sony digital camera. (object appears in the photos as a round white object against a clear blue sky without showing the chrome color or a detailed shape due to the long distance of the object).

19:47	while attempting to locate the object in the viewfinder of my video camera, my son called back and said that the object had disappeared. i looked back up to confirm that indeed the object was gone and no longer appeared against the clear blue sky. i continued to search the sky for 30 minutes without the object reappearing.

09/03/08 (wednesday)

19:45	reappearing star-like object appears high in the sky directly above my residence in westlake, la. object remained stationary in the sky.

19:47	called my son out of the house to watch the object while i laid flat on my back observing the object straight up in the sky with binoculars.

19:50	observed a much smaller yet very bright star-like object moving towards the original larger star-like object and then it stopped. at this point, i ask my son if he saw the second smaller object without binoculars and he stated that he did not. after about ten seconds, the smaller object moved toward the larger object again. as the smaller object met the larger object, the larger object appeared to become eclipsed by the smaller object and a corona of light could be seen around the larger object with the light at the center of the larger object blocked out. at the point that the larger object became eclipsed, my son stated that he could no longer see the object without binoculars. i continued to watch the ���eclipse star��� for a minute with binoculars and then it faded and appeared as faint light in three separate spots and then faded out completely. 

20:05	observed a large twin engine turbo prop military type aircraft flying low directly over my residence located in a populated neighborhood.

20:12	observed a large commercial airline flying low and banking a turn directly over my residence. (it should be noted that large aircraft are almost never observed flying low over my residence located in a populated neighborhood).

09/04/2008 (thursday)

19:40	star-like object appears in the south, 70 degrees above the horizon as clouds begin to break at my residence in westlake, la.. the object could best be described as a normal star in appearance against the still blue sky in the background. object appears in wrong part of sky to be a star and 20-30 minutes early for a normal star to appear. observed object for 16 minutes with binoculars. during the time observed, the object changed from a pale star appearance to a yellow flattened  shape.  

19:56	object begins to fade against a still clear cloudless portion of the sky and then appears as faded scattered light in three separate locations in the sky before the object is completely undetectable. 

20:06	what appears to be a fighter jet passes directly over my residence flying very low.
	(it should be noted that military aircraft are seldom seen in this area over a residential neighborhood, nor are low flying aircraft of any type with the exception of an infrequent piper or crop duster during the daylight hours).

20:16	what appears to be the same fighter jet makes another very low pass over my residence for a second time.

20:30	ended sky surveillance without star-like object returning.
content.summary: Multiple daylight sightings of appearing/disappearing star-like object
